attributes.action: Pay Gurkha Pensioners resident in the UK a livable pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present Gurkha soldiers living in this country only receive a paltry pension. Surely they should receive a pension in line with our own forces. They have served alongside our forces taking on the same committment and therefore there should be parity with our ex servicemen.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Pay Gurkha Pensioners resident in the UK a livable pension."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13604.asp

Prime Minister's Office
